story:
Once upon a time, in the beautiful highlands of Ethiopia, there lived a young girl named Selam. Selam had big, bright eyes that sparkled like the stars in the night sky and a smile that could brighten even the darkest of days.

Every night before bedtime, Selam would climb up to the roof of her house to gaze at the vast expanse of the night sky. She would close her eyes and listen to the gentle rustling of the trees and the distant sounds of village life. She felt a deep connection to the world around her, and she knew that the universe was full of wonders waiting to be discovered.

One night, as Selam lay down on her rooftop bed, she saw a shooting star streak across the sky. "I wish to explore the world and discover its many secrets," she whispered into the night. And to her surprise, the shooting star seemed to twinkle brighter in response.

The next morning, when Selam woke up, she found a small, mysterious map lying next to her bed. The map showed a winding path that led deep into the heart of the Ethiopian highlands, where the most enchanting adventures awaited.

Selam knew that this was a sign that her wish was about to come true. So, with a heart full of excitement and curiosity, she packed a small bag with some snacks, a bottle of water, and her trusty flashlight. With the map in hand, she set off on her grand adventure.

As Selam journeyed through the mountains and valleys, she encountered friendly farmers tending to their fields, playful monkeys swinging from branch to branch, and colorful birds singing melodies that filled the air with joy. Along the way, she learned valuable lessons about kindness, perseverance, and the beauty of the natural world.

Finally, after many days of travel, Selam reached the top of a high peak, where she was greeted by a breathtaking view of the Ethiopian countryside spread out before her like a patchwork quilt. At that moment, she realized that the true magic of the world lay not just in far-off lands, but in the everyday moments shared with loved ones and the beauty of nature all around.

With a heart full of gratitude and wonder, Selam made her way back home, where her family greeted her with open arms and warm smiles. And as she lay down on her rooftop bed once more, she knew that her adventures had only just begun.

And so, dear Selam, may your dreams be filled with wonder and inspiration, and may you always remember that the greatest adventures are those that begin in your own heart. Good night, sweet child, and may your dreams take you to the farthest corners of your imagination.
